Public Sub Complete ()

abstract member Complete : unit -> unit override this.Complete : unit -> unit

summary.span: 通知 ，告知其不应该生成任何更多的消息也不应使用任何更多的延迟消息。

span.span: Signals to the that it should not accept nor produce any more messages nor consume any more postponed messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在数据流块上调用之后, 该块将完成, 并且其任务在处理所有以前可用的数据后将进入最终状态。After has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete, and its task will enter a final state after it has processed all previously available data. 不会阻止等待完成, 而是会启动请求;若要等待完成, 可以使用任务。 will not block waiting for completion to occur, but rather will initiate the request; to wait for completion to occur, the task may be used.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task Completion { get; }
.property instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task Completion
Public ReadOnly Property Completion As Task
public: property System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ Completion { System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ get(); };
member this.Completion : System.Threading.Tasks.Task

summary.span: 获取 ，其表示数据流块的操作和完成。

span.span: Gets a that represents the asynchronous operation and completion of the dataflow block.
The task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据流块在当前未处理消息时, 将被视为已完成, 并保证其不会再处理其他消息。A dataflow block is considered completed when it is not currently processing a message and when it has guaranteed that it will not process any more messages. 完成关联的块后, 返回的将转换为已完成状态。The returned will transition to a completed state when the associated block has completed. 当块根据数据流块的定义语义成功完成其处理时, 它将转换为状态。It will transition to the state when the block completes its processing successfully according to the dataflow block's defined semantics. 当数据流块由于未经处理的异常而提前完成处理时, 它将转换为状态, 并将在数据流块完成后转换为状态由于接收取消请求而提前处理。It will transition to the state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to an unhandled exception, and it will transition to the state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to receiving a cancellation request. 如果任务在状态中完成, 则其`Exception`属性将返回 , 其中包含导致块失败的一个或多个异常。If the task completes in the state, its `Exception` property will return an containing the one or more exceptions that caused the block to fail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不包含块当前正在处理的任何项或已被该块处理的任何项。The does not include any items currently being processed by the block or any items that have already been processed by the block.

span.span: Causes the to complete in a state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在数据流块上调用之后, 该块将完成, 并且其任务将进入最终状态。After has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete, and its task will enter a final state. 如果对块进行错误处理, 就像取消块一样, 导致缓冲消息 (未处理的输入消息以及 unoffered 的输出消息) 丢失。Faulting a block, as with canceling a block, causes buffered messages (unprocessed input messages as well as unoffered output messages) to be lost.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有链接到此实例的实例可以使用, 并且它必须仅用于保留此源之前提供给目标的实例。Only instances linked to this instance may use , and it must only be used to reserve instances previously offered by this source to the target. 如果`true`返回, 则必须随后为此消息调用或。If `true` is returned, the must subsequently call either or for this message. 如果不这样做, 可能会导致源无法将任何进一步的消息传播到此目标或其他目标。Failure to do so may result in the source being unable to propagate any further messages to this or other targets. 当目标持有任何内部锁时, 不得调用。 must not be called while the target is holding any internal locks. 这样做将违反锁层次结构, 以避免数据流网络中的死锁。Doing so will violate the lock hierarchy necessary to avoid deadlocks in a dataflow network.

summary.span: 向 提供消息，向目标提供使用和延迟消息的机会。

span.span: Offers a message to the , giving the target the opportunity to consume or postpone the message.
The status of the offered message.

returns.span: 如果消息为该目标接受，则将返回 ，将返回，并且源不应再使用提供的消息，因为其现在归目标所有。

span.span: If the message was accepted by the target, is returned, and the source should no longer use the offered message, because it is now owned by the target.

returns.span: 如果消息因该目标延迟，则将以通知的形式返回 ，该通知是目标稍后可能会尝试使用或保留消息的通知；同时，源仍拥有消息并将其提供给其他块。

span.span: If the message was postponed by the target, is returned as a notification that the target may later attempt to consume or reserve the message; in the meantime, the source still owns the message and may offer it to other blocks.

returns.span: 如果目标被推迟，但源为 ，则返回 。

span.span: If the target would have otherwise postponed but source was , is instead returned.

returns.span: 如果尝试了接受此则消息但由于将消息交付给另一目标或放弃该消息的源而错过该消息，则将返回 。

span.span: If the target tried to accept the message but missed it due to the source delivering the message to another target or simply discarding it, is returned.

returns.span: 如果目标选择不接受消息，则将返回 。

span.span: If the target chose not to accept the message, is returned.

returns.span: 如果源选择不接受该消息并将从不从此源接受另一则消息，则将返回 。

span.span: If the target chose not to accept the message and will never accept another message from this source, is returned.
The is not valid.

exception.span: 或者，如果被提供了非 null ，则 只能为 true。

span.span: -or- may only be true if provided with a non-null .
